attributes.action: reform gun law - to allow for defence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Gun law in the UK is a joke, it was invented in the 60's to cover up all the deaths, the police caused.  At that time it was too expensive to get a gun, but now, we as citizens should be able to buy a gun at a local store (including cooloff period). Why shouldn't we have access to the same weaponry as the soldiers have in the gulf?
Maybe it is because the government is scared, as they have made a mint out of us? Maybe they are scared of retaliation?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
